page.shortlink: api objects query object find last function
page.description: The .FIND_LAST() method returns the last key value.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "" qry = tbl.query_create() ? qry.find_last() = Key = "11112-02" Record = 6
